name: 錬金術の娘
summary: Hero was born in a rich house and he uses assets to finance extreme alchemy experiments to recover lost secrets. There are three students in this academy to take care of and try new inventions effects in dungeons with.
info:
• 开发: BLACK PACKAGE
  • 发行日期: 1998/05/28
  • 原画: あきよしよしあき
